jobsJson.description:
This position represents an opportunity to work closely with the senior leadership at the fastest
growing fin-tech company in Indonesia. The GoPay Commercials team on a day to day basis supports
the CEO in driving commercial strategy and long term value creation.

The core scope of the Commercials team involve:
(i) Corporate Development;
(ii) Strategic Partnerships;
(iii) Commercial Strategy;
(iv) External Stakeholder Management.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work with senior management including the firm’s CEO and Head of Commercials to define key strategies and initiatives for monetization, market expansion, and inorganic growth in Indonesia and throughout the region
  • Build and execute strategic domestic and international partnerships
  • Conduct negotiations on key commercials and drive the legal documentation process (working closely with our business and legal teams)
  • Lead execution for inorganic growth projects
  • Manage relationships with key senior external stakeholders

• Minimum Bachelor Degree from reputable university
  • Has more than 10 years experience in investment banking, consulting, and/or payments/financial services
  • Has knowledge of fin-tech, payment systems, and/or e-money
  • Is fluent in English (required) and Bahasa Indonesia (preferred)
  • Has extensive experience in M&A execution and/or commercial negotiations
  • Is comfortable reading, structuring, negotiating legal agreements (term sheets, SPA, SHA)
  • Can think strategically about corporate development
  • Is entrepreneurial, comfortable working in small teams to drive transformation decisions
  • Is extremely team oriented, experienced in (and enjoys) providing clear guidance and patient mentor-ship to juniors
  • Has the ability to manage multiple stakeholders and is solutions oriented to drive optimal outcomes
